name: Sock Me
description:
Sock Me is a multiplayer sock-matching card game! Play against your friends locally or against an AI.

How To Play:

The goal of the game is to get the most Sock Points. You can Bank one sock each turn. Each sock is worth between 1 and 13 points. You earn double points if your sock matches the Target Color.

If you don’t like your sock, press “Sock Me” to get a new one. But if you get the Doom Sock you bust and get nothing! The player with the most points after 5 rounds wins!
